sources.title: The Silver Bullet (1935) Tom Tyler | Romance, Western Full length Classic Movie
sources.description:
Tom Henderson is made Sheriff of Chico to fight Slim Walker's gang. Unknown to Tom, banker Luke Hargrave is the gang's real boss. Dad Kane is looking for the man that blinded him whom he can remember by his voice. He finds him when the gang robs the bank and Tom chases them down.

Director:  Bernard B. Ray
Writers:  William L. Nolte, Carl Krusada
Stars: Tom Tyler, Jayne Regan, Lafe McKee
Genres: Classics, Romance, Western

CCC CHAPTERS: in the general comments, tell us your favorite scene or line in the movie, with a time stamp & we will add it here!
00:00 Full Length Movie
01:04 Sick and tired of this
02:22 Cleaning up it's a cinch
02:53 Drunken cowboys ride into town
03:48 Fisty cuffs
05:06 Apologize to the lady
06:55 3 cowboys in a bar
07:23 A year supply of chewing tobacco 
07:57 Mary the Drug addicted donkey
09:52 Chase scene
